name: Crazed Shopper
description:
Description:

The world has fallen into anarchy. Alien creatures have overtaken Earth's supermarkets. You take advantage of the chaos and try to steal as much as you can. Security measures have been taken against all intruders. You are no exception. Can you navigate the chaos and emerge with your head above the flood? Good luck. 

Instructions:

  • Pick up items (press F) and deposit them at the drop-off green box!
  • W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys for movement
  • Q/E to rotate

Acknowledgments:

  • Quick Outline asset by Chris Nolet
  • (Bossa Nova Loop) Thank You for Shopping! by plasterbrain
  • Gunfire sound by johnyridgeback
  • Poof sound by ryansitz
  • intro 1 by RichHeard
  • Medium Far Explosion by unfa
